author: Ground News
title: Ground News - Aaron Gordon's dog bite, Sammy Sosa's sneeze and more strange sports injuries
text:
Summary by Ground News Denver Nuggets forward Aaron Gordon needed 21 stitches after being bitten by a dog. Gordon joins a bizarre club of athletes who were injured in extremely odd ways. From off-field accidents to celebrations gone wrong, here's a list of the strangest ways players have missed time over the past 20 years. Share menu More
